TopicTitle: StarSystems/Planet Factory CE: Triple Star System!

Articles.Content:
Hey, I was bored.... Meant to mimic Alpha Centauri.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Currently working on a planet that will be included in the download that is shown as well that orbits Klieonis, along with a WIP moon for it.

License/download on my main thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/89569-Daedalus-Industries-Megathread

REQUIRED MODS:

StarSystems

RealSolarSystem

Planet Factory CE

KittopiaTech Ingame Terraforming Tools

Edited August 10, 2014 by _Augustus_
It's actually just three stars orbiting a common barycenter, which along with Kerbol and many other stars orbits Blacky Karman.

Can we get a download?

My mod is a no Distributing license Also kerbin+ is a no distributing posting a download link would voliate licenses.

Going to have to troll, sorry....

No distributing? lolwut? CC-NC-ND is non commerical, non derivative. http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/

Going to have to troll, sorry....

No distributing? lolwut? CC-NC-ND is non commerical, non derivative. http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/

I do see what he's saying. Basically his stuff is under a Non-Derivitives license. So this pack is in violation of his license agreement. _Augustus_, your enthusiasm is awesome but you really do have to get at least a passing knowledge of the kinds of licenses out there before building mash ups

Hello the rogue moderation team!

I'd appreciate everyone to not start backseat moderating this way. If you see something that is a violation of a forum rule,please report it and let us do our job.

Now, given PF is now under GPL, and that StarSystems is under CC-BY-NC-SA this is all fine, so everyone go back to your occupations.

Also, there isn't even a download link, y'all need to relax.

Thank you

I added a download. Don't worry, I didn't break any licenses.
